job.title: Software Engineer II
job.description: in this role you should have excellent problemsolving skills and thorough knowledge of android device architecture communication and documentation are key to this role as you will be working directly with the architecture and management teamsltbrgtltulgtltligtunderstanding of android device architecture focused on kernel hal debugltligtltligtread requirements predominantly related to hardware peripherals integrate provide hal interface to applicationltligtltligtwe expect at least of tasks will be related to codingltligtltligtprevious knowledge on any device development is a plusltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtpreferred educationltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtbachelors degree required or equivalent experienceltligtltligtminimum of years of experienceltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtkey skills and competenciesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtdevice driver and hardware abstraction layer developmentltligtltligtknowledge of linux kernel bootloadersltligtltligthands on experience in development using any one of the languages cc javaltligtltligtexcellent communication skillsltligtltligtexperience with android developmentltligtltligtdemonstrated technical experienceltligtltligtdemonstrated experience working independently and collaboratively on projectsltligtltligtdemonstrated experience trouble shootingltligtltligtbroad knowledge of applicable it systemsapplicationsltligtltligtexperience developing new systems and toolsltligtltligtexperience in documenting and maintaining up to date systems proceduresltligtltligtadvanced analytical skillsltligtltulgt
